sentences.en: a drug that has a beneficial effect on the immune system
sentences.cn: 有益于免疫系统的一种药物

sentences.en: A good diet is beneficial to health.
sentences.cn: 良好的饮食有益于健康。

sentences.en: A half-hour daily walk can be more beneficial than one hard bout of exercise a week.
sentences.cn: 每天散步半小时会比一周剧烈运动一次对身体更有益。

sentences.en: Advice - giving can be beneficial to both the regulators and the regulated.
sentences.cn: 提供意见对管理者及被管理者都有益处.

sentences.en: An aptitude for computing is beneficial for students taking this degree.
sentences.cn: 计算才能对于攻读这个学位的学生有益处。

sentences.en: an arrangement that is mutually beneficial
It can be beneficial to share your feelings with someone you trust.
sentences.cn: 向自己信任的人倾诉感情是很有益处的。

sentences.en: It's a beneficial result to us.
sentences.cn: 对我们来说那是有利的结果。

sentences.en: Sometimes, avoidance of one particular food will have this beneficial effect, though admittedly rarely.
sentences.cn: 有时，对某一食物的忌口能带来这种好处，尽管不可否认这种情况极为少见。

sentences.en: The revival of the railway service will be immensely beneficial for the speedy movement of passengers and cargo.
sentences.cn: 铁路运输的复兴对加快客货运送大有助益.

sentences.en: There's a lot of evidence that oily fish, as distinct from fatty meat, has a beneficial effect.
sentences.cn: 有许多证据表明油性鱼，与高脂肪肉不同，对人体有益。

sentences.en: They compete with beneficial vegetation for space, nutrients, and water.
sentences.cn: 它们与有益的植物竞争空间, 营养和水分.

sentences.en: They have seen the change as unquestionably beneficial to the country.
sentences.cn: 他们认为这个变革对该国无疑是非常有益的。

sentences.en: Walking is extremely beneficial to your body shape.
sentences.cn: 散步对于塑形非常有好处。

sentences.en: We should critically assimilate whatever is beneficial in literature and arts from other countries.
sentences.cn: 我们应当批判地吸收别国文学艺术中一切有益的东西.

sentences.en: While a moderate amount of stress can be beneficial, too much stress can exhaust you.
sentences.cn: 适度的压力是有好处的，但是压力太大会把人压垮。

words.tran_cn: 受益地；获利地；有使用权地
